backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for a veterinary surgery case management system with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two empty-state UI fix features (Dashboard and CasesListView) to their respective source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's React components, hooks, utilities, and CSV tooling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the SurgiPaw PWA, referencing the app icon, web manifest, and the React entry point script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, theme colors, display mode, and icon assets at multiple resolutions.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first strategy with precaching of the app shell and runtime caching of static assets, while skipping Internet Identity and canister API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal display, and the sticky app header with login controls.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: SVG icon component representing the Culture workflow task using three small circles on a larger circle background.
SVG icon component representing the Discharge Notes workflow task as a document with a checkmark.
SVG icon component representing the Follow-Up workflow task as a circular arrow.
SVG icon component representing the Histopathology workflow task as a microscope-like shape.
SVG icon component representing the Imaging workflow task as a framed chart/graph.
SVG icon component representing the Labs workflow task as a test tube shape.
SVG icon component representing the PDVM Notified workflow task as a speech/message bubble.
SVG icon component representing the Surgery Report workflow task as a document with a scalpel-like line.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Maps task type strings to their corresponding icon components and renders the matching icon, returning null for unknown or missing types.
Base SVG wrapper component for workflow icons that applies shared size, stroke, and color tokens to its children.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Exports shared design tokens for workflow icons including a color map per task type, icon size, and stroke width.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Empty file intended to define an authentication context for the application.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Empty file intended to implement the authentication view component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, clearing the React Query cache on logout and retrying login if already authenticated.
Empty file intended to implement a login form component.
Empty file intended to implement a logout button component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a newly authenticated user to enter their name and saves it via the saveCallerUserProfile mutation, blocking dismissal until submitted.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Re: Empty file intended to implement a user registration form component.
frontend/src/features/auth/validation.ts: Empty file intended to contain authentication-related validation logic.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the CHECKLIST_ITEMS configuration array for all case task types and exports helper functions to get default selections, remaining incomplete tasks, task colors, and icon color classes.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Empty file intended to implement a camera capture modal component.
Expandable card component displaying a surgery case's patient info, remaining checklist tasks, and actions for toggling task completion, editing, and deleting the case.
Dialog for editing an existing surgery case's fields and task checklist selections, converting between date strings and nanosecond timestamps before submitting via the updateCase mutation.
Dialog for creating a new surgery case with form fields, task checklist selections, speech-to-text quick fill, structured text parsing, and auto-suggestion from previous cases.

Main list view component for surgery cases that combines search, filtering (species, tasks), sorting, and pagination with loading/error/empty states, and includes buttons for creating new cases and CSV import/export.
A search input component with a search icon and a clear button that filters cases by any field.
A dropdown select control for choosing the sort order of the cases list, using predefined sort options.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, other), with selection state persisted to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by task types and completion status, with filter state persisted to sessionStorage.
Renders a checklist of selected tasks for a surgery case, allowing toggling of individual task completion states with visual strikethrough feedback.
Provides CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, handling parsing, progress tracking, error reporting, and calling create/update mutations for each imported case.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY typed entry with auto-slash insertion and a calendar popover picker, with validation and blur handling.
Provides functions to export surgery cases to a CSV file and import cases from a CSV file, including row parsing, validation, and error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 17-column CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, TypeScript types, and validation constants for species, sex, and boolean values.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Exports utility functions to filter surgery cases by species, task types, incomplete tasks, or fully completed tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: A React hook that wraps the browser's SpeechRecognition API to provide recording state, transcript accumulation, error handling, and start/stop controls.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors, and removing artifacts; used as a fallback text cleaner.
Parses label:value formatted text lines into a partial CaseFormData object by mapping recognized field labels to their corresponding typed values.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates and triggers a browser print dialog for a styled HTML report of surgery cases that have at least one incomplete task, rendered inside a hidden iframe.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of all surgery cases, including patient details and remaining checklist tasks, with proper CSV escaping and a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utility functions for PDF display, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex values to human-readable strings, plus text truncation and task list formatting.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utility functions for CSV report output, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex values to human-readable strings.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of surgery cases by a search query, matching against patient/owner fields and incomplete checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that sorts surgery cases by arrival date or number of remaining open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines constant option arrays for species and sex dropdowns, and the CaseFormData interface used for surgery case form state.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields (MRN, pet name, owner name, breed) and date utility functions for parsing, formatting, and converting between Date objects and nanosecond bigints.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard React component that displays surgery cases with filtering, searching, sorting, and stats (open tasks, active cases), and supports adding new cases via a dialog.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open task items from a surgery case and calculate the total count of open tasks across all cases.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the debounced value after the delay has elapsed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login/logout state, AuthClient creation, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks (useQuery/useMutation) for all backend canister operations including CRUD for surgery cases, tasks, user profiles, dashboard data, and OpenAI config.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light-mode design system, including colors for cards, primary actions, complaints, and notes fields.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file providing full type definitions for the tesseract.js OCR library, including Worker, RecognizeResult, PSM/OEM enums, and related interfaces.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends border radius and font family, and registers the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the veterinary surgery case log app, its known issues (empty-state handling, duplicate agent warning, manifest icon error), existing features, and pending fix requests.
